name: CueLogic
overview:
Cuelogic is your partner for building cutting edge software products using Open source and Mobile technologies. To build these exceptional products, we work closely with our partners using a highly collaborative approach to make sure all the risks are managed well.

We have a track record of delivering high quality software on time and on budget. We match the expectations of continually evolving and changing products needs with our unique agile approach. Our range of experience includes a simple CMS to a state-of-the-art SaaS solution, over the cloud. Our flexibility, adaptability and working in a partnership model including a risk sharing approach makes it all possible
